headline: Herschel Walker: I Dont Think Anyone Really Trusts the Biden Administration
author: Trent Baker
sentences: Sunday on FNCs Fox & Friends Weekend, former NFL star running back Herschel Walker, a Republican running for U.S. Senate in Georgia, pushed back against the Biden administrations attempt to pass the so-called Build Back Better agenda.
Walker said he was running for Senate because he wanted to build back trust, which he argued had been lost during President Joe Bidens time in office.
And thats the reason Im running for this Senate seat  because I want to bring trust back into this country, the greatest country in the world.
And you know, you look at what [Biden] did in Afghanistan, no one wants to talk about that anymore, but do the military trust in him?
Right now, theres a new variant coming out, and you know, I think the biggest problem now is were not energy independent no more.
What I mean by had the that is I dont think anyone really trusts this administration, Walker asserted.
Where is the trust in the administration anymore?
He continued, [T]he supply line has gone down.
You know, the price of everything has gone up.
No one is talking about the border anymore.
People that lead in their cities?
Do our police trust in him?
